forum.name: updates
forum.description: find out what's new with anylad. feature announcements and bug fix info. thanks all!
forum.latestCommentText: im gonna miss it for sure

thread.title: Thread linking & more

comments.text: Hi all! Today's v135.1 (you're on [version]) brings the following:
You can now trigger forum searches from your comment, like [-> body]! This finds other topics & comments within the same board.
You can now copy thread links from the back of forum threads!
... Use it for either the new command "show thread", or paste it into comments like this [thread: 5c378a21de19833185810936]
There's a new button "Quests" in the areas dialog (currently on the second page), opening the Quests board! [board: quests]
Update 136.1 (you're on [version]): Multiple openings of quest threads when achieving them should now be guarded against! Thx Angel!

thread.latestCommentText: Update 135.2 (you're on [version]): Multiple openings of quest threads when achieving them should now be guarded against! Thx Angel!
